section.title:
checks
posting individual
accounts payable
posting checks for Post A/P Check
section.para: To post an individual Check, select the "Post A/P Check" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting an individual Check, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account for the Check you want to post.
Specify the number of the Check you want to post.
Only printed Checks from prepared Check Runs associated with the specified Bank Account will appear in the list.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without posting a Check, returning you to the application desktop.
Posts the Check, using the specified parameters.
